Package controller

All classes that control the encapsulation process.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatasetController  
    Decapsulator
    The Decapsulator reverses the information encapsulation process.
    Encapsulator
    Static component that is responsible for the encapsulation.
    PeriCATController
    This controller controls the whole interaction of the framework components.
    PeriCATControllerBuilder
    Builder of the builder pattern for the PeriCATController of this program.
    ScenarioController
    This class manages the user Scenarios, which include the predefined scenario examples, and user created scenarios.
    ScenarioSaverAndLoader  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PeriCATControllerBuilder.Mode
    This enum expresses the possible modes in which PeriCAT can run.

Package controller Description

All classes that control the encapsulation process. The PeriCATControllerBuilder is just for starting the application and building the PeriCATController, which is the main controlling component. Encapsulator is called for encapsulation and Decapsulator for decapsulation, the DatasetController keeps track of the added files, and the ScenarioController manages the user scenario, defined by the questionnaire at the GUI, or by a scenario configuration file.
